name: Racebox (early access)
description:
www.racebox.pl

GeneRally-inspired game.

Currently you can play in single player mode. Occasionally I'm hosting a server to test this and that. If you wish to participate - join the discord (link is somewhere on the website www.racebox.pl)

Tyres and fuel are "simulated", but still hardcoded. Next release of the game will improve it.
